snippet: Parliament on Tuesday ratified an agreement with the United States on adoptions.
abstract: Russian Parliament ratifies an agreement with the United States on adoptions, formalizing an accord that was brokered after several reports of apparent abuse or maltreatment of Russian children living with American parents; agreement specifies that children from either country can be adopted abroad only when it is impossible to find a family in the native country.
lead_paragraph: Parliament on Tuesday ratified an agreement with the United States on adoptions.

headline.main: Russia: Parliament Ratifies Adoption Pact With U.S.
headline.print_headline: Russia: Parliament Ratifies Adoption Pact With U.S.
